entry.title: Java Codes for Some Sorting Methods
entry.content:
``` java Insertion Sort public static void insSort(int[] a) {

int mark = 0; // current insertion value

for (int i = 1; i < a.length; i++) {
    mark = a[i];

    int j = i - 1;
    while (j >= 0 && a[j] > mark) {
        int temp = a[j];
        a[j] = a[j + 1];
        a[j + 1] = temp;
        j--;
    }
}

} ```

``` java Selection Sort public static void selSort(int[] a) {

for (int i = 0; i < a.length; i++) {
    int minSpot = i;

    for (int j = i + 1; j < a.length; j++)
        if (a[j] < a[minSpot] ) {
            int temp = a[minSpot] ;
            a[minSpot] = a[j];
            a[j] = temp;
        }
}

} ```

``` java Bubble Sort public static void bubSort(int[] a) {

for (int i = 0; i < a.length; i++)
    for (int j = i + 1; j < a.length; j++)
        if (a[j] < a[i]) {
            int temp = a[j];
            a[j] = a[i];
            a[i] = temp;
        }

} ```
